TABLE.NAME: auth_oauth_state
TABLE.COMMENT: The OAuth State allows moodle to track the kind of authorization that is in process.

FIELD.NAME: refresh_id
FIELD.COMMENT: the tokenid to be refreshed (NULL if not refreshing)

FIELD.NAME: azp_id
FIELD.COMMENT: the authorization service this state is used with.

FIELD.NAME: redirect_uri
FIELD.COMMENT: used for web frontend

TABLE.NAME: auth_oauth_azp
TABLE.COMMENT: OAuth Authorization Servers to which Moodle is a client

FIELD.NAME: iss
FIELD.COMMENT: String used by the authority to identify itself

FIELD.NAME: flow
FIELD.COMMENT: code, implicit, hybrid, or assertion

FIELD.NAME: auth_type
FIELD.COMMENT: which moodle authorization type to use (e.g shibboleth if different auth methods are allowed)

FIELD.NAME: credentials
FIELD.COMMENT: Any credentials for authorizing moodle with the authorization service. This filed is typically empty.

FIELD.NAME: attr_map
FIELD.COMMENT: contains the attribute mapping per authority

FIELD.NAME: inactive
FIELD.COMMENT: flag an authority as inactive

TABLE.NAME: auth_oauth_keys
TABLE.COMMENT: cryptographic keys for communicating with the authorization service

FIELD.NAME: token_id
FIELD.COMMENT: Only used for trust agents

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Which user is associated with the token.

FIELD.NAME: azp_id
FIELD.COMMENT: points to the authorization service, that authorized this token

FIELD.NAME: parent_id
FIELD.COMMENT: points to the token id that has been used for issuing a secondary token (NULL if not a secondary token)

FIELD.NAME: created
FIELD.COMMENT: timestamp when initially created

FIELD.NAME: expires
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp when access_token expires

FIELD.NAME: initial_access_token
FIELD.COMMENT: Keeps the original access token, so a trust agent can revoke a token even after it has expired and has been refreshed

FIELD.NAME: initial_refresh_token
FIELD.COMMENT: Keeps the original access token, so a trust agent can revoke a token even after it has expired and has been refreshed

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user identificator

FIELD.NAME: token_type
FIELD.COMMENT: Token Type

FIELD.NAME: authority_id
FIELD.COMMENT: this typically holds the reference to the token authority

FIELD.NAME: parent_id
FIELD.COMMENT: holds the references to the proxy token

FIELD.NAME: access_token
FIELD.COMMENT: a random string used to identify a token

FIELD.NAME: expiration
FIELD.COMMENT: The actual token expiration date

FIELD.NAME: expires_in
FIELD.COMMENT: The time when the token expires from the time it has been issued

FIELD.NAME: scope
FIELD.COMMENT: basic scope of the token

FIELD.NAME: sign_key
FIELD.COMMENT: this is the key used for singing

FIELD.NAME: decrypt_key
FIELD.COMMENT: holds a key for decrypting a token

FIELD.NAME: consumed
FIELD.COMMENT: Boolean value if the token has been consumed

TABLE.NAME: auth_eduid_authorities
TABLE.COMMENT: This table holds the keys and tokens for the registered authorities

FIELD.NAME: privkey_for_authority
FIELD.COMMENT: holds the formatted private key that moodle uses to work with that authority

FIELD.NAME: authority_public_key
FIELD.COMMENT: The public key that the authority uses for working with moodle
